points.Gain First-hand Experience: Build real, product-focused projects—from language models to applied ML systems—that result in tangible outcomes you can showcase.
points.Build Your Portfolio: Create impactful deliverables that strengthen your resume and demonstrate your proficiency with in-demand tools and technologies.
points.Collaborate With Your Peers: Work alongside a team of data enthusiasts & an experienced DS3 mentor to brainstorm, develop, and launch projects that reflect real-world challenges and solutions.
